data.title: Warrior Savitri Film Released On 25th August 2016 All Over Is One More Milestone For Prince Movies as Line Producer and Rakesh Sabharwal as Ex-Producer
data.text:
Posted by admin on Oct 26, 2016 in Latest News, News | 0 comments

Warrior Savitri Is A Film From Award Winning Director Of Going To America A Dr. Boob Production. The Film is deftly directed by Param Gill, from USA who has the distinction of doing many Hollywood Films, He has also written enchanting Lyrics and given Melodious music. The Film has Ex producer Rakesh sabharwal, Line Production Prince Movies,

The film stars Cast : Om Puri, Lucy Pinder, Niharica Raizada, Rajat Barmecha, Gulshan Grover, Rajat barmecha Asif ali & Tim Man.

Prince Movies is the banner of Rakesh Sabharwal the well experienced production designer and business executive of many movies. Rakesh Sabharwal is also Member of Indian Motion Picture Association Mumbai From the last many years he has been the member of Central Circuit cine Association Jaipur and Indore. He had been A distributor done more then 120 films, expert in distribution business all over India turned into producer, can any Business Executive beat this record? The man who has 37 years of practical experience in the field of film distribution and exhibition on, was also facilater for big cinema reliance Rakesh Sabharwal has his own offices in Jaipur, Indore, Amrawati, and Mumbai.

With the release of Warrior Savitri, Prince Movies has the distinction of releasing the film of Hollywood fame director Param Gill.and Hollywood actress Lucy Pinder Tim Man

Watch three more big cast films coming from Prince movies and Rakesh Sabharwal

The Gangs Of Samastipur Films Editing Work In Full swing

Posted by admin on Oct 26, 2016 in Latest News, News | 0 comments

The action oriented film The Gangs Of Samastipur has completed shooting and have come To Mumbai for post production activities, Editing Dubbing, Poster Designing all post production work is in full progress for an very early release. Th film has many melodious songs, action scenes and drama. Thi Film stars Rakesh K. Chaudhary, Anand Dev Mishra, Priya Rajput, Komal Mishra, Ali Khan and others.

This Film Is being made under the banner of Rajnandani Film Entertainment, and being Produced by Rakesh K. Chaudhary, Written & Directed by Vinod Masih, Music by Chandan Vikash, Lyrics R. V. Paswan, D.O.P. D. Bhawna –P. Mishra,Editor Nakul Prasad, Dance: Kedar Subba – Rajesh Sharma, Fights by Premji, Production. DhirajK. Pandey.

Alok Shrivastava Producer Finalized 2 New Hindi Films

Posted by admin on Oct 26, 2016 in Latest News, News | 0 comments

Alok Shrivastava Bollywood Producer has finalized 2 New Hindi Films, for which pre production work is going on, Script finalising, hunt for starcast for the suitable characters etc. Also the situational songs are being written, to make it highlight of the film.

Alok Shrivastava Bollywood Producer Turned Distributor Will be releasing Many films In Hindi, Marathi & Bhojpuri in 2017 as several deals with many producers are at the final stage of negotitians. Many new producers are daily reaching His office At Crystal Plaza to take an appointment for the distribution of their completed films.

Grand Music Launch of BHAY

Posted by admin on Oct 26, 2016 in Latest News, News | 0 comments

Amidst flashing cameras, glittering stars and an exhilarating atmosphere, the music of 5G International presents and Sachin Katarnawre produced, BHAY, was launched. The music was launched by Bollywood stars Raveena Tandon and Sohail Khan. The music was launched with great enthusiasm in the prescence of numerous celebrities. On this occasion, the Trailer of the movie and songs were screened. Actors Raveena Tandon and Sohail Khan said that the successful run of Marathi films is praiseworthy, and the movie BHAY will definitely be a new experience for the movie goers.

Praising all the actors of the movie BHAY, Raveena Tandon expressed her wish to act in Marathi films. At the launch, it was also announced that the movie will also be released in three languages, Tamil, Telugu and Arabic. Rahul Bhathankar has done the direction and editing.

This movie has songs of three different genres. The two songs, “Saajanaa” and “Mi aalo” have been sung by Brijesh Shandilya and Tulika Upadhyay. Both the songs have been picturized in a different style. The songs take us on a small journey on a cruise, and we are treated to beautiful visuals of helipads and skyscrapers of Dubai and pristine and famous beaches. The song “Chal re” has vocals by Ali Aslam. The lyrics by Shekhar Astitva have been set to music by Vikram Montrose. The Music of BHAY is Released by Zee Music.

Abhijit Khandkekar, Satish Rajwade, Uday Tikekar, Smita Gondkar, Sanskruti Balgude, Vinit Sharma, Siddharth Bodke, Shekhar Shukla, Dhananjay Mandrekar, Nupur Dudhwadkar have acted in this film. Each one has some fear in their mind. How people living with fear in their mind, face various difficulties, is what we are going to see in this absorbing movie BHAY. The co-producers of the movie are Ajay Joshi. Ashish Chauhan is the executive producer. Story, screenplay and dialogues are by Nitin Vijay Supekar. Art direction is by Prashant Rane. Ajay Devrukhkar is the choreographer and the cinematographer is Rajesh Rathore.

Curtain of “Sai Shraddha Saburi” Production House unveiled by Cabinet Minister Ramdas Athawale.

Posted by admin on Oct 26, 2016 in Latest News, News | 0 comments

Cabinet Minister Shri Ramdas Athawale unveiled the curtain of a new Production House “Sai Shraddha Saburi” recently at Citizen Hotel, also a film was announced “Bharatratna Dr. Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar” which will be launched shortly and will be a tribute to Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar, the creator of Indian Constitution.

This production house is floated by four young enthusiastic friends Miss Rashmi Birhade who owns a company called RB in media-n-image consultant, Sunil Kalludi a hotelier and diamond merchant, Pradeep Pali again a hotelier and Narendra Wahane a businessman, came together and started this production house and will be launching their first film on Dr Ambedkar soon. Shri Ramdas Athawale said that he will be a back bone for them and wished them good luck. Other prominent guest present on this occasion were actor Johny Lever, Mukesh Rishi, Devdutta Nage (Jai Malhar fame), Bharat Chawda and Jiya Chij.

SAANSEIN team seek Ajmer Dargah’s blessings

Posted by admin on Oct 26, 2016 in Latest News, News | 0 comments

It is rightly said that before you begin anything fresh you seek the good wishes and blessings of the divine. The star cast of upcoming film SAANSEIN – The Last Breath Rajniesh Duggall and Sonarika Bhadoria along with the producer Goutam Jain recently visited Ajmer Dargah to give an auspicious kickstart to their city tour promotions. In fact, even before the film rolled, it was decided that the city tours should begin from Khawaja Gharibnawaz Dargah Ajmer.

Rajniesh stated, “We always wanted to start our journey with the blessing of God. Hence we started our promotions from Ajmer Sharif. Visiting Ajmer Sharif was a divine experience for all of us and I wish the blessings stay with us and our film SAANSEIN.”

Many Bollywood stars like Amitabh Bachchan, Shahrukh Khan, Kangana Ranaut, Priyanka Chopra, Kapil Sharma, Katrina Kaif have visited the holy shrine of Ajmer Sharif in the past to pray for their films’ success.

Starring Rajniesh Duggall, Sonarika Bhadoria along with Hiten Tejwani, Neetha Shetty, Vishal Malhotra, Amir Dalvi, SAANSEIN is directed by Rajiv S Ruia. The music is composed by Vivek Kar and lyrics are penned by Kumar. SAANSEIN is produced by Goutam Jain and Vivek Agarwal under the banner GPA Productions.

SAANSEIN – THE LAST BREATH is set to release on 11th November, 2016.
